text: In the Name of the Girl () is a 2011 Ecuadorian comedy-drama movie directed by Tania Hermida and starring Eva Mayu Mecham Benavides, Markus Amaru Mecham Benavides, Javier Izquierdo, Tatiana Ugalde, Juana Estrella, Felipe Vega, Pancho Aguirre. == Other websites == * Category:2011 comedy-drama movies Category:Ecuadorian movies
title: In the Name of the Girl
